data.name: Wizardry: Prisoners of the Battles & The Five Ordeals Audio Collection
data.detailed_description:
Wizardry: The Five Ordeals & Prisoners of the Battles Sound Track land on Steam !

Tracks has been created by excellent composers.
Kenichi Koyano (Sorcer Striker, and more)
Mitsuhiro Kaneda (13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim, many Elminage Series, Odin Sphere, and more)
Masaharu Iwata (Tactics Ogre, Fantasy Earth Zero, Final Fantasy Tactics, and more)
Hitoshi Sakimoto (13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim, Final Fantasy Tactics XII, Final Fantasy Tactics Series, Valkyria Chronicles, and more)

and All Trucks remastering supervision by Basiscape.
